name: ITRP _ Aero Star
description:
Get into the aerocycle and let's go!


ITRP _ Aero Star offers you to overcome an obstacle course.
Push your skills to the limit on a dynamic, dangerous, constantly changing track consisting of strictly sequential sections.
The mechanics and environment are constantly changing, creating unique situations throughout the track.
Mistakes are not forgiven without good reasons. It is assumed that in some segments you will have to practice additionally to achieve an acceptable result. Or maybe you don't have to - it all depends on you.

You are a volunteer who has agreed to participate in research conducted by a local organization as a test subject.
It is extremely important that the test be as painless as possible, and the result depends only on you.
Carefully prepare for the race. You have been provided with everything you need to be fully armed, and your personal supervisor will carefully monitor your development.
The test will be completed successfully if you get to the very end of the track, overcoming all its challenges.

Features:

  • Scripted track. Low level of the randomness factor.
  • Constantly changing mechanics that force you to adapt to new conditions.
  • All segments are unique and do not repeat throughout the game.
  • It will take no more than an hour to get from the beginning to the end of the track.
  • Checkpoints save and update progress.
  • Progression system based on the reduction of previously received damage.
  • Several endings, depending on the exact way the track was overcome.
  • Training mode that allows you to configure the track in detail.
  • A challenge worthy of a true hardcore racing fan!
